summary.span: Provides the main access point for classes interacting with the security system.

span.span: Provides the main access point for classes interacting with the security system.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全提供了访问和操作安全策略配置方法。Security provides methods to access and manipulate the security policy configuration. 不能创建的实例。You cannot create instances of .

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether code must have in order to execute.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether code must have in order to execute.

value.span: 如果代码必须具有才能执行; 否则为。

span.span: if code must have in order to execute; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性为`false`，即使代码而无需才能执行。If this property is `false`, even code without can execute. 执行检查很高，可以消除延迟策略决策的优点。Execution checking is expensive and can eliminate the advantages of lazy policy resolution. 若要禁用检查时所需的执行，提供此属性。This property is provided to disable execution checking when needed. 对此属性的更改不会持久保留直到调用。A change to this property is not persisted until is called. 新进程将不会影响更改之前保存在注册表中。New processes will not be affected by the change until it is persisted in the registry.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool CurrentThreadRequiresSecurityContextCapture ();
.method public static hidebysig bool CurrentThreadRequiresSecurityContextCapture() cil managed
Public Shared Function CurrentThreadRequiresSecurityContextCapture () As Boolean
public: static bool CurrentThreadRequiresSecurityContextCapture();
static member CurrentThreadRequiresSecurityContextCapture : unit -> bool

summary.span: Determines whether the current thread requires a security context capture if its security state has to be re-created at a later point in time.

span.span: Determines whether the current thread requires a security context capture if its security state has to be re-created at a later point in time.

returns.span: if the stack contains no partially trusted application domains, no partially trusted assemblies, and no currently active or modifiers; if the common language runtime cannot guarantee that the stack contains none of these.

span.span: if the stack contains no partially trusted application domains, no partially trusted assemblies, and no currently active or modifiers; if the common language runtime cannot guarantee that the stack contains none of these.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用之前缓存后成功的安全要求获得的敏感数据的方法。You can use the method before you cache sensitive data that is obtained after successful security demands. 如果方法已调用更高版本在堆栈上，不应缓存而不捕获相应的安全上下文的数据。If the method has been called higher on the stack, the data should not be cached without capturing the corresponding security context. 否则为敏感数据获取下可能会变得可用，它是编写的代码不再使用的运行到位。Otherwise, sensitive data that is obtained under an may become available to code that is no longer be running with that in place. > [!IMPORTANT] > 仅在时，返回值是可靠`false`，这意味着，保证线程不需要安全上下文捕获。The return value is reliable only when it is `false`, which means that the thread is guaranteed not to require a security context capture. 安全上下文捕获不是有必要，若要避免安全漏洞时，该方法可能返回 true。The method may return true when a security context capture is not necessary, to avoid security vulnerabilities. 是安全关键的因为其主要用途是为了避免不必要的安全上下文捕获，这表明使用它的代码是安全敏感，并且必须进行审核。 is security-critical because its main use is to avoid unnecessary security context captures, which indicates that the code using it is security-sensitive and must be audited.

permission.span: 直接调用方需要完全信任。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任的或透明的代码使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

param.name: evidence
param.span: The host evidence to match to a permission set.

span.span: The host evidence to match to a permission set.

summary.span: Gets a permission set that is safe to grant to an application that has the provided evidence.

span.span: Gets a permission set that is safe to grant to an application that has the provided evidence.

returns.span: A permission set that can be used as a grant set for the application that has the provided evidence.

span.span: A permission set that can be used as a grant set for the application that has the provided evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]中的主机证据`evidence`必须包含证据。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the host evidence in `evidence` must contain evidence. > > 下表显示对于每个区域返回的权限集。The following table shows the permission sets that are returned for each zone. |区域Zone|权限集Permission set| |----------|--------------------| ||`FullTrust`| ||`LocalIntranet`| ||`Internet`| ||`Internet`| ||无None| ||无None| 其他证据，如或，可能会被视为。Other evidence, such as or , may be considered. 沙盒可以使用返回的权限集运行该应用程序。The returned permission set can be used by a sandbox to run the application. 请注意，此方法未指定策略，但可帮助确定应用程序请求在权限集中是否合理的主机。Note that this method does not specify policy, but helps a host to determine whether the permission set requested by an application is reasonable. 此方法可用于将区域映射到沙盒。This method can be used to map a zone to a sandbox. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法以获取权限设置的沙盒应用程序。The following example shows how to use the method to obtain the permission set for a sandboxed application. 有关在沙盒中运行的应用程序的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 运行部分受信任的代码在沙盒中](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md)。For more information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](~/docs/framework/misc/how-to-run-partially-trusted-code-in-a-sandbox.md). [!code-csharp[sandboxingApis#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/SandboxingAPIs/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sandboxingApis#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/SandboxingAPIs/VB/program.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets the granted zone identity and URL identity permission sets for the current assembly.

span.span: Gets the granted zone identity and URL identity permission sets for the current assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的建议替代方法是使用正在执行的程序集的 URL 和区域证据来调用为每个证据类型。The recommended alternative to this method is to use the URL and Zone evidence for the executing assembly to call for each evidence type. 从返回的权限集调用标识为根据其区域和源服务器的 URL 执行的程序集授予的权限。The permission sets returned from the calls identify the permissions granted to the executing assembly based on its zone and URL of origin. > [!NOTE] > 此成员所做的 ECMA 公共密钥，这不是有效的加密密钥，但伪键的链接要求。This member makes a link demand for the ECMA public key, which is not a valid cryptographic key but a pseudo key. 在.NET Framework 中 ECMA 伪键的链接要求自动转换为 Microsoft 公共密钥链接要求。Within the .NET Framework the link demand for the ECMA pseudo key is automatically converted to a link demand for the Microsoft public key. 安全异常基于 Microsoft 公共密钥不 ECMA 伪键。The security exception is based on the Microsoft public key, not the ECMA pseudo key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 授予的权限由策略确定，并且不同的需求可能重写，例如 assert。Granting of permissions is determined by policy and is different from a demand subject to overrides, such as an assert. 此外，仅测试的调用代码程序集，独立于在堆栈上的其他调用方授予。Also, only tests the grant of the calling code assembly, independent of other callers on the stack.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.IEnumerator PolicyHierarchy ();
.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.IEnumerator PolicyHierarchy() cil managed
Public Shared Function PolicyHierarchy () As IEnumerator
public: static System::Collections::IEnumerator ^ PolicyHierarchy();
static member PolicyHierarchy : unit -> System.Collections.IEnumerator

summary.span: Provides an enumerator to access the security policy hierarchy by levels, such as computer policy and user policy.

span.span: Provides an enumerator to access the security policy hierarchy by levels, such as computer policy and user policy.

returns.span: An enumerator for objects that compose the security policy hierarchy.

span.span: An enumerator for objects that compose the security policy hierarchy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的枚举器提供了连续表示位于各自的策略对象 （计算机、 用户、 企业、 应用程序域） 的层次结构的级别。The returned enumerator provides successive objects that represent the policy at the respective (machine, user, enterprise, application domain) level of the hierarchy. 这些对象是活动策略对象中;更改这些对象可以具有不可预知的结果。These objects are the live policy objects; altering these objects can have unpredictable results. 最小策略层次结构包含计算机级别、 企业级和用户级别。Minimum policy hierarchy consists of a machine level, an enterprise level, and a user level. 但是，在层次结构可以包括其他级别。However, the hierarchy can include additional levels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将调用安全策略引擎，为其提供调用代码的标识的证据。This method invokes the security policy engine, providing it with evidence of the calling code's identity. 由安全策略确定结果。The result is determined by the security policy.

param.name: evidences
param.span: An array of evidence objects used to evaluate policy.

span.span: An array of evidence objects used to evaluate policy.

summary.span: Determines what permissions to grant to code based on the specified evidence.

span.span: Determines what permissions to grant to code based on the specified evidence.

returns.span: The set of permissions that is appropriate for all of the provided evidence.

span.span: The set of permissions that is appropriate for all of the provided evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将调用安全策略引擎，为其提供的数组对象。This method invokes the security policy engine, providing it with an array of objects. 返回的权限集表示仅适用于数组中的每一个证据的这些权限。The returned permission set represents only those permissions that apply to every evidence in the array. 这些权限是等效于或每个证据，策略应该已授予的权限的子集。These permissions are either equivalent to, or a subset of the permissions that policy would have granted to each individual evidence. 此方法的行为如同上解析上的每个策略的结果执行交集数组中的对象。This method behaves as if you were performing an intersection on the results of resolving policy on each of the objects in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将调用安全策略引擎，为其提供调用代码的标识的证据和权限集的代码的请求。This method invokes the security policy engine, providing it with evidence of the calling code's identity and the set of permissions the code requests. 由安全策略确定结果。The result is determined by the security policy. 此方法返回将由安全系统授予的权限集，并返回作为输出参数将被拒绝的权限集。This method returns the set of permissions that would be granted by the security system, and returns the set of permissions that would be denied as an output parameter. 有效授予的权限是不在拒绝集的授予权限集。The effective granted permissions are those in the granted set that are not in the denied set.

exception.span: This method uses code access security (CAS) policy, which is obsolete in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)].

span.span: To enable CAS policy for compatibility with earlier versions of the .NET Framework, use the [<legacyCasPolicy> element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md).

exception.span: Policy fails to grant the minimum required permissions specified by the parameter.

span.span: Policy fails to grant the minimum required permissions specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是证据的用于分析指定的策略配置如何处理特定类型。This method is useful in analyzing how a specified policy configuration works with specific kinds of evidence. 代码组将从策略层次结构匹配的所有适用的级别返回`evidence`参数。Code groups will be returned from all applicable levels of the policy hierarchy matching the `evidence` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Security.PermissionSet ResolveSystemPolicy (System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.PermissionSet ResolveSystemPolicy(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed
public: static System::Security::PermissionSet ^ ResolveSystemPolicy(System::Security::Policy::Evidence ^ evidence);
static member ResolveSystemPolicy : System.Security.Policy.Evidence -> System.Security.PermissionSet

param.name: evidence
param.span: The evidence set used to evaluate policy.

span.span: The evidence set used to evaluate policy.

summary.span: Determines which permissions to grant to code based on the specified evidence, excluding the policy for the level.

span.span: Determines which permissions to grant to code based on the specified evidence, excluding the policy for the level.

returns.span: The set of permissions that can be granted by the security system.

span.span: The set of permissions that can be granted by the security system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用的安全策略引擎，并为其提供调用代码的标识的证据。This method invokes the security policy engine and provides it with evidence of the calling code's identity. 结果由系统安全策略不包括任何策略。The result is determined by the system security policy exclusive of any policy.

summary.span: Saves the modified security policy state.

span.span: Saves the modified security policy state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将策略保存通过公开， ，以及其他类表示配置的安全策略。This method saves the policy as exposed by , , and other classes that represent configuration of the security policy. 除非调用此方法时，策略对象所做的更改将不会保存，并将不会影响后续应用程序运行。Unless this method is called, changes made to the policy objects will not be saved and will not affect subsequent application runs.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The security manager cannot be turned off on MS runtime")

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether security is enabled.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether security is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用了安全;否则为。

span.span: if security is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性由[Caspol.exe （代码访问安全策略工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md)This property is used by the [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md) `-security` (`-s`) 选项可禁用基于代码的安全性。`-security` (`-s`) option to turn off code-based security. 提供管理员可以禁用代码访问安全性的方法。 provides a way for administrators to disable code access security. 当禁用代码访问安全性时，所有代码访问要求都会成功。When code access security is disabled, all code access demands succeed. 实际上，这将授予所有代码`FullTrust`。Effectively, this grants all code `FullTrust`. 禁用代码访问安全性绕过安全系统，以便执行代码可能比等效的安全策略授予稍好`FullTrust`于的所有代码。Disabling code access security bypasses the security system so that code might perform slightly better than the equivalent security policy granting `FullTrust` to all code. 此属性不会禁用基于角色的安全性;因此，需求不会受到影响。This property does not disable role-based security; therefore, demands are not affected. > [!CAUTION] > 禁用代码访问安全性会使系统容易受到恶意代码（如病毒和蠕虫）的攻击。Disabling code access security makes the system vulnerable to attacks by malicious code such as viruses and worms. 禁用代码访问安全性不会自动阻止托管的代码的任何方式运行。Disabling code access security does not automatically block managed code from running in any way. 只会造成的托管代码不受限制地运行的代码访问安全系统，在仅进行最格外谨慎。It only causes managed code to run without restriction by the code access security system, and should only be done with the most extreme caution. 当已采取其他安全措施来帮助保护系统安全时应仅完成关闭安全性以获得额外的性能。Turning off security to gain extra performance should only be done when other security measures have been taken to help protect system security. 其他的安全防范措施包括与公共网络断开连接、从物理上保证计算机的安全等等。Examples of other security precautions include disconnecting from public networks, physically securing computers, and so on. 对此属性的更改不保存在注册表中，直到调用。A change to this property is not persisted in the registry until is called. 新进程将不会影响更改之前保存在注册表中。New processes will not be affected by the change until it is persisted in the registry. 更改正在运行的进程中的此属性的值不一定是更改状态以预期的方式。Changing the value of this property in a running process does not necessarily change the state in the expected manner. 若要确保更改已生效，必须调用并启动新进程。To ensure changes have taken effect, you must call and start a new process.
